featureSchema.name: Integration with CI/CD Pipelines
featureSchema.description: Integrates with automated testing environments to enable end-to-end testing and continuous integration workflows.
featureSchema.userStory: As a DevOps engineer, I want to integrate the mock server into our CI/CD pipelines so that automated tests can be executed reliably across environments.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: The mock server must support API endpoints and be easily configurable within CI/CD scripts to simulate API behavior during automated testing.
featureSchema.diagram: Diagram depicting the CI/CD pipeline with the integration of the mock server for automated testing.
featureSchema.additional: Ensure configuration files are compatible with common CI/CD tools and scripts.
featureSchema.prompt: Implement a feature that enables the mock server to be integrated into CI/CD pipelines, allowing for automated tests to be run against simulated API endpoints.
featureSchema.notes: Keep environmental variables and configuration separate to allow flexibility in different pipeline setups.
